Pan: Command line tool with sane defaults for building academic articles from markdown using pandoc
=======================================================================================================

You will need to install pandoc first: http://johnmacfarlane.net/pandoc/installing.html


Includes Stata features to build 'woven' documents with markdown, stata and LaTeX to pdf.



Output formats
------------------

rtf

html

plain

pdf (default)
